titleStmt.title: The manners and customs of the principal nations of Europe gathered together by the particular observation of James Salgado ... in his travels through those countries ; and translated into English by the authors care, anno 1684.
titleStmt.author: Salgado, James, fl. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Snowden for the author,

notesStmt.note: In double columns, English and Latin verse.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
